ygData.subject: RE: Invisibility against undead (was End of Kiting?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My site is designed as a non-spoiler, in-character review of the songs. I ll post something there about the variability, but I won t go so far as to put a
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:36 PM 8/25/99 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>If someone decides to write the advanced bard guide for EQVault it would be
>nice if the list of mobs with the innate ability to See Invisibility was
>also included. Would also be good to have this info in the Bard Song
>analysis that is posted on someone's bard site (can't remember whose website
>it is but Talies the Wanderer come to mind).
>
>Galtin of E'ci

My site is designed as a non-spoiler, in-character review of the songs.
I'll post something there about the variability, but I won't go so far as
to put a full-out list, sorry.

Talies the Wanderer
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
